name: v1.10.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod (preferred)

1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "1.10.0")

multitool = use_extension("@rules_multitool//multitool:extension.bzl", "multitool")
multitool.hub(lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json")
use_repo(multitool, "multitool")
```

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "49d8a42de8e7242fa41fc18014bcb05b6612f08be7376a3da57bc90f382ec415",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-1.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v1.10.0/rules_multitool-1.10.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)

# required since 0.15.0 to enable only downloading tools used by this workspace
load("@multitool//:tools.bzl", "register_tools")

register_tools()
```


## What's Changed
* Remove some Theorem automation by @markelliot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/96
* ensure that run_in targets include direct tool deps by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/94
* fix example tests which depended on `bazel run` behavior by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/95
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/92
* feat: include generated API docs in release by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/99
* Migrate renovate config by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/100
* chore(deps): upgrade to bazel_lib 3 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/102

## New Contributors
* @novas0x2a made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/94
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/pull/92

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_multitool/compare/v1.9.0...v1.10.0

name: v1.9.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod (preferred)

1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "1.9.0")

multitool = use_extension("@rules_multitool//multitool:extension.bzl", "multitool")
multitool.hub(lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json")
use_repo(multitool, "multitool")
```

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "76fc5eee72586b3cdffd66ea0b1f9759489343612428ab0ea79da94d3f6a481f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v1.9.0/rules_multitool-1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)

# required since 0.15.0 to enable only downloading tools used by this workspace
load("@multitool//:tools.bzl", "register_tools")

register_tools()
```


## What's Changed
* Update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate-thm[bot] in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/89


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

```starlark
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "db97c15d18101978a17a04c55f9c1c485e9f5bab90b5997e50be5a55583404b8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-1.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v1.1.0/rules_multitool-1.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)

# required since 0.15.0 to enable only downloading tools used by this workspace
load("@multitool//:tools.bzl", "register_tools")

register_tools()
```


## What's Changed
* Update bazel-contrib/setup-bazel action to v0.12.1 by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/68
* Fix dev dependency compatibility with 'bazel mod tidy' by @markelliot in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/70
* Fix typo in readme.md by @tnielens-centrica in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/72

## New Contributors
* @markelliot made their first contribution in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/70
* @tnielens-centrica made their first contribution in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/72

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

## What's Changed

name: v0.15.0
body:
## Breaking Changes

**(WORKSPACE users only)**: WORKSPACE users must now include an additional load and function call:
```
load("@multitool//:tools.bzl", "register_tools")

register_tools()
```

## Using Bzlmod (preferred)

1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.15.0")

multitool = use_extension("@rules_multitool//multitool:extension.bzl", "multitool")
multitool.hub(lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json")
use_repo(multitool, "multitool")
```

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "e1de5ada5b032b18e0a85b4791a06939568eb515d1ed1b2b2c9da8d922bb563b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-0.15.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v0.15.0/rules_multitool-0.15.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)

# required since 0.15.0 to enable only downloading tools used by this workspace
load("@multitool//:tools.bzl", "register_tools")

register_tools()
```


## What's Changed
* Update bazel-contrib/setup-bazel action to v0.9.1 by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/61
* Lazily download tools by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/62
* Eliminate the extra workspace repo by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/63


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

## What's Changed
* Add docs about how to update multitool's lockfile by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/31
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v6 by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/37
* Disable renovating Bazel dependencies by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/38
* Simplify the download steps of release in automation.md by @hunshcn in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/40
* Fix lockfile registration to ensure root module lockfiles win conflicts by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/43

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "b354be5278ef326dbf613e5d52ac5d897c0b410bcdc2b577b8a7a682ed1c5a37",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-0.7.1",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v0.7.1/rules_multitool-0.7.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Use exec to run cwd target by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/30


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1

name: v0.7.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod (preferred)

1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.7.0")

multitool = use_extension("@rules_multitool//multitool:extension.bzl", "multitool")
multitool.hub(lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json")
use_repo(multitool, "multitool")
```

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "4e9647b7a49cac5c777febad09d454ce70265a50f987607831ce109b3a5d80e9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-0.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v0.7.0/rules_multitool-0.7.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Fix release automation script by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/25
* Document how to run tools on the command line by @alexeagle in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/26
* Add convenience target for running in the current working directory by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/29


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
**Note: breaking change for WORKSPACE users -- bazel_features must now be included, see instructions below.**

## Using Bzlmod (preferred)

1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.6.0")

multitool = use_extension("@rules_multitool//multitool:extension.bzl", "multitool")
multitool.hub(lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json")
use_repo(multitool, "multitool")
```

## Using WORKSPACE
1. Create a multitool.lock.json ([schema](https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/blob/main/lockfile.schema.json))
2. Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "06f02b97b6badb3227df2141a4b4622272cdcd2951526f40a888ab5f43897f14",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.9.0/bazel_features-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)

http_archive(
    name = "rules_multitool",
    sha256 = "557b71b7d8d9975afc7fc2381c4c0e4220d43a581fb019217ca0a040d6cbebff",
    strip_prefix = "rules_multitool-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_multitool-0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_multitool//multitool:multitool.bzl", "multitool")

multitool(
    name = "multitool",
    lockfile = "//:multitool.lock.json",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Improve schema, support 'type' for archives and 'headers' for all binary kinds (breaking change for WORKSPACE) by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/23


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.5.0")
```


## What's Changed
* feat: allow multiple lockfiles for WORKSPACE users as well by @alexeagle in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/21


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.3.0")
```

## What's Changed
* Add new required field to presubmit.yml by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/10
* chore: add a test reproducing #13 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/14
* Only download necessary toolchains by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/16

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_multitool", version = "0.2.0")
```


## What's Changed
rules_multitool has a completely new interface, both for defining tools to make available and for accessing tools/toolchains.

Tools are now defined using a lockfile (a precursor and generator of this lockfile will follow in a subsequent release). 

Tools are now accessed through a hub repo as `@multitool//tools/<tool name>`. 

As before, tools are backed by a Bazel toolchain, and the toolchains may be sparsely populated with OS/CPUs that matter for your builds.

See the updated readme and/or #9 for more details. 

* Fix presubmit.yml by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/6
* Fix broken README link by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/7
* Refactor to properly support bzlmod by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/pull/9


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_multitool/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0
